title: Evergreen: The Story Behind the Story with Benjamin A Boyce
description:
"Social justice is both antisocial and injust"...I speak with Evergreen State College graduate Benjamin Boyce about his documentary series about the protests at Evergreen when he was in attendance at the school. Though this was a serious topic, I thoroughly enjoyed our talk, Ben is easily one of my favourite people

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Evergreen-The-Story-Behind-the-Story-with-Benjamin-A-Boyce-e90ko0

Follow Benjamin Twitter @BenjaminABoyce
and check out his YouTube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/c/BenjaminABoyce

Follow me on twitter @AndreaLynnLewis

Links:
Benjamin mentions a Yale prof who goes through critical theory using a children's book, here is the link for that: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4YY4CTSQ8nY
Harrison Bergeron Story: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harrison_Bergeron
